segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing from the sink, pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware of the mess forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can be so focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are in the background, both conspiring in their own little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, stretching up towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he’s balancing looks so precarious; I can’t help but feel a twinge of concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how oblivious the woman is to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, her hand reaching up with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're getting away with this right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
